reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect portable gaming monitor!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this monitor to use specifically with our Xbox One S. I plan on purchasing a new Xbox for Christmas to play on the TV but still want to use the old Xbox so that we can all play together. I also purchased a Mini HDMI Male to HDMI Female Adapter so that I could connect this monitor to my Xbox with the included HDMI cable. This monitor is 17.3" 2K with 2560 x 1440p high resolution and 144Hz refresh rate. The monitor is very slim and lightweight. It really is plug-and-play, very easy to set up and use. As you can see from my picture, we do have to sit relatively close to the Xbox due to the length of the HDMI cord.In the pictures, you can see the portable monitor on the left connected to my gaming laptop on the right. You will notice that the colors are warmer on the monitor as I have enabled the blue light filter to minimize eye strain. I love that it has that option. You can also see the matte screen and how it reduces the glare from the flash on my camera. The image is very clear, there is no delay when plugged into my gaming laptop. I've also noticed that when plugged into our old Xbox that it loads in faster to games than my gaming computer. Very impressed with this monitor so far.I don't care for the magnetic case that doubles as a stand. I found it to be flimsy and the magnet is very weak for a monitor of this size. When used as a stand, it will gradually slide down and fall so that is annoying but if you were traveling with this device, I feel like the case would provide decent protection for the screen. I did contact UPERFECT about the stand issue. This company has amazing customer service! They respond very quickly and go out of their way to make sure that any issue you have is addressed. They sent me a new stand, which you can see in the pictures. The UPERFECT stand works great with this monitor as it has a 360° rotatable base, and it also allows you to adjust the monitor to a comfortable viewing angle. I couldn't be happier with the customer service I received and I know if I have any other issues with this monitor, they will take care of me. (Thanks UPERFECT!)Overall, I definitely recommend this portable monitor. The image quality is very nice, easy to set up with plug and play. Includes Freesync and 144 Hz refresh rate. Amazing customer service support! The speakers are okay for this price point and being a portable device. The cover/stand needs improvement, a stronger magnet is needed. Other than that, the button on the side to adjust screen settings is not super user-friendly and could be made easier if it had a remote or was touch screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and Ease of Use
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired this portable monitor that has remarkably enhanced my mobile workspace, addressing my need for a compact and efficient display solution. This monitor stands out for its exceptional lightness, making it a breeze to carry around, whether I'm heading to a coffee shop or traveling for work. The convenience factor is amplified by its simple connectivity – a singular Type-C to Type-C cable is all it takes to connect it to my laptop, thanks to the laptop's Thunderbolt port. This seamless integration has significantly streamlined my setup process.The monitor's design is thoughtfully crafted, especially with its case stand, which not only provides robust protection but also doubles as a reliable support, making it versatile for various viewing angles. I'm particularly impressed by the stand's stability and the overall build quality of the monitor. Furthermore, its compact footprint is a major advantage. The monitor fits effortlessly in tight spaces, making it an ideal choice for small desks or crowded work areas where space is a premium.Another aspect worth mentioning is the customer support. They have been outstandingly responsive and helpful. When I encountered a minor issue, their quick and efficient troubleshooting guidance was truly appreciated, reflecting their commitment to customer satisfaction.This portable monitor is a superb choice for anyone seeking a blend of portability, ease of use, and reliability. Its design, functionality, and customer support have all contributed to a highly satisfying user experience. I'm thoroughly pleased with this purchase and would confidently recommend it to professionals and students who are often on the move and in need of a dependable, high-quality portable monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent portable monitor and exemplary service from Uperfect
reviews.reviewText: I don't write many reviews, but I feel compelled to in this case because of the excellent customer service I received.This is an excellent portable monitor overall. I bought it as a second monitor for home and mobile use when travelling. It has been a good purchase for both of these use cases. Colour and brightness are surprisingly good with some tweaking of settings. I don't use it outdoors, so I can't comment on that, but for indoor use, even in a well-lit room, it is great.After a few months, my monitor had an issue. I contacted the supplier (Uperfect) through Amazon to report this. The response I received was fast and pretty incredible. A service representative asked for some information, which I supplied. Uperfect took a decision quickly (the next day), which I appreciated. Shortly thereafter, I received a new unit. Exemplary customer service, not much else I can say.
El monitor funciona bien, se ve bien, y se oye. Pero tuve un problema con el transformador eléctrico y me lo sustituyeron ágil y fácilmente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Guter Monitor für unterwegs (Office und PS5)
reviews.reviewText: In der modernen Arbeitswelt, in der Mobilität eine immer größere Rolle spielt, sind tragbare Monitore zu einem unverzichtbaren Begleiter geworden. Nachdem ich mehrere Modelle getestet habe, möchte ich meine Erfahrungen mit dem UPERFECT Portable Monitor teilen:Verarbeitung & Funktionen: Dieser Monitor sticht im Vergleich zu anderen tragbaren Modellen hervor. Die Qualität der Verarbeitung und die gebotenen Funktionen erfüllen sowohl die Anforderungen beim Arbeiten als auch beim Spielen.Stromversorgung: Es ist wichtig zu beachten, dass für den Betrieb immer ein USB-C Ladekabel benötigt wird. Während ein solches Kabel im Lieferumfang enthalten ist, wäre eine direkte Strom- und Bildversorgung über USB-C ein zusätzlicher Komfort. Dennoch, wenn alle Kabel korrekt angeschlossen sind, funktioniert der Monitor einwandfrei.Bildqualität: An sonnigen Tagen könnte der Monitor etwas heller sein. Trotzdem ist die Sichtbarkeit ausreichend. Während er mit einem Standardmonitor nicht mithalten kann, bietet er dennoch eine solide Leistung. Bei Office-Arbeiten und beim Spielen mit der PS5 war das Delay minimal und akzeptabel für den Preis. Die Full-HD-Auflösung auf einem 15-Zoll-Monitor ist mehr als ausreichend. Ein teureres 2K-Modell zeigte kaum erkennbare Unterschiede.Zusätzliche Funktionen: Der Monitor bietet viele Anschlussmöglichkeiten, was das Arbeiten mit verschiedenen Geräten erleichtert. Das integrierte Cover dient zudem als praktischer Laptopständer.Fazit:Der UPERFECT Portable Monitor bietet eine beeindruckende Kombination aus Mobilität und Funktionalität. Für Nutzer, die einen zuverlässigen Begleiter für einfache bis mittelanspruchsvolle Arbeiten suchen, ist dieser Monitor eine hervorragende Wahl. Ich empfehle jedem, der in Erwägung zieht, einen tragbaren Monitor anzuschaffen, sich dieses Modell genauer anzusehen und sich selbst ein Bild zu machen!
